name: Splaysoft
tag_list: ios, games, news, social-networking, music, geo-tagging
overview:
We make iOS apps.

At Splaysoft, LLC. we recognize that the future of computing is in the hands of the consumer, literally. Mobile computing on the iPhone, iPod Touch and the iPad is fast and powerful and most importantly easily accessible by everyone from ages 1-100+. With this in mind we have sought to develop apps for all sorts of people. Weâ€™ve created news apps, games, love apps, jokes apps, national and city apps, and many more. Our goal is to the meet the needs of our customers and with over 75 million devices running iPhone OS that is a lot of people.

Our apps have had hundreds of thousands of downloads and millions of hits.

A number of our apps are in the top 3 in iTunes for key search terms.

Autism News Reader “Autism” Gay News Reader “Gay News” Heads Tails “Heads Tails” Get Out LGBT “LGBT”

Currently we are focusing all our efforts on our latest app, Salms. To read more about Salms go to http://splaysoft.com/Site/SALMS.html.

milestones.description: Set Target Growth For Salms: 10,000 users / 100,000 Salms by Jan 1. 2011.
